title: IFR names top 5 global robotics trends of 2026
description:
The IFR has made its predictions of the top 5 robotics industry trends for 2026, including an increased focus on cybersecurity.

The post IFR names top 5 global robotics trends of 2026 appeared first on The Robot Report.
